definition: Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)

sentences.english: Masai grasslands of northern Tanzania, the Masai people live.
sentences.chinese: 坦桑尼亞北部的馬薩伊草原上，居住着馬薩伊民族。

sentences.english: Baobab trees frame a serene view of night skies in Tarangire National Park, Tanzania.
sentences.chinese: 坦桑尼亞塔蘭吉雷國家公園夜空下猴麪包樹的畫面。

sentences.english: But the Tanzanian government is not biting.
sentences.chinese: 但是坦桑尼亞政府並不買賬。

sentences.english: Some of the hardest hit residents lived in central and southern Tanzania.
sentences.chinese: 某些受災最嚴重的居民居住在坦桑尼亞的中南部地區。

sentences.english: Actually this time I come to visit my old friends.
sentences.chinese: 我這次訪問坦桑尼亞實際上是來看老朋友。

sentences.english: Campaigners say more than 17 albinos have been killed in Tanzania in the last few years.
sentences.chinese: 活動家稱最近幾年已經有超過17人在坦桑尼亞被殺。

sentences.english: In Tanzania, however, the reform program had gotten off track.
sentences.chinese: 但坦桑尼亞的改革方案曾經脫離了軌道。

sentences.english: Tanzania’s government is not accustomed to upstart s.
sentences.chinese: 坦桑尼亞政府還不習慣成爲暴發戶。

sentences.english: Among them, Tanzania and Kenya as the main beneficiaries.
sentences.chinese: 其中，坦桑尼亞和肯尼亞爲主要受惠國。

sentences.english: Permission has not yet been granted for the airline to overfly Tanzania.
sentences.chinese: 這家航空公司還未獲得飛越坦桑尼亞領空的許可。

sentences.english: A small shop in Tanzania that offers cell-phone service.
sentences.chinese: 坦桑尼亞一個提供手機服務的小商店。

sentences.english: At present, Tanzania is at the centre of the world's ivory slaughter.
sentences.chinese: 目前，坦桑尼亞是世界屠宰大象謀取象牙的中心。

sentences.english: We have a good example in Tanzania.
sentences.chinese: 我們在坦桑尼亞有一個很好的例子。

sentences.english: The suspension of the prime minister of Tanzania.
sentences.chinese: 還有坦桑尼亞首相的停職。

sentences.english: The company also started exporting special meat cuts and processed products to Tanzania.
sentences.chinese: 該公司還開始向坦桑尼亞出口特殊分割肉和肉製品。

sentences.english: Tanganyika and Zanzibar join to form the Republic of Tanzania .
sentences.chinese: 坦噶尼喀與桑吉巴合併組成坦桑尼亞共和國。

definition: East Timor (officially Democratic Republic of Timor-Leste)

pinyin: Wu1 zi1 bie2 ke4 si1 tan3
Ji2 er3 ji2 si1 si1 tan3

definition: Guatemala/see also 瓜地馬拉|瓜地马拉[Gua1 di4 ma3 la1]
Kenya (Tw) (written as 肯尼亞|肯尼亚 in PRC)

pinyin: Sha1 wu1 di4 A1 la1 bo2
